articles.title: Five savvy homemade Father's Day gifts for this Sunday
articles.author: Mel Hunter
articles.summary: Home Bargains is offering the Nanobebe Ultimate Newborn 24-piece steriliser set at a discounted price. Argos sells the Dyson AM09 Hot + Cool fan heater, while B&M offers the Blaupunkt bladeless standing fan.

articles.title: Shoppers race to popular supermarket as bargain Fairy pods for 100 washes spotted on shelves
articles.author: Eliana Nunes
articles.summary: Farmfoods is selling Fairy laundry pods (100 washes) for £19.99. This bargain is available in Farmfoods stores across the UK.

articles.title: Microsoft dives into the handheld gaming PC wars with the Asus ROG Xbox Ally
articles.author: Ars Technica
articles.summary: Microsoft announced the Asus ROG Xbox Ally hardware line. The device supports games from Xbox, Game Pass, Battle.net, Steam, Epic Games Store and Ubisoft Connect.

articles.title: 37 Products So Terrific, They Deserve All The Accolades
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: The article highlights a range of new products including Good Molecules Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel designed to reduce swelling and puffiness, Medicube's dual-textured toner pads for gentle skin exfoliation, and Brazilian Bum Bum body cream made with guarana extract, coconut oil, and caffeine to smooth and tighten skin. It also features Revlon's oil-absorbing volcanic face roller to instantly remove excess oil and FryAway Waste Cooking Oil Solidifier Powder for easy disposal of leftover cooking grease.

articles.title: 27 Things That'll Make Doing Your Hair Easier
articles.author: Iman Sakrani
articles.summary: Several new hair products and accessories are being introduced to help with various styling needs. These include a ring hair straightening brush, Briogeo's Heat Protectant Crème, Bunzee Bands, Revlon one-step hair dryer and volumizer, Kitsch heatless hair curler, Sexy Hair's volumizing powder, Ebin New York 24-hour edge tamer, and I Dew Care mattifying powder shampoo, Lottabody's Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse, and Living Proof de-frizzer. These products aim to simplify hairstyling, protect hair from damage, and enhance hair texture and volume.

articles.title: Xbox Ally X Review: Asus Portable Console First Impressions
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Microsoft's Rog Xbox Ally, a portable PC gaming device, has launched with the AMD Ryzen Z1 Extreme processor. This device provides access to various game libraries such as Steam, Epic Games Store, GOG, and Xbox Game Pass. The Xbox Ally aims to capitalize on the portable PC gaming market and offer a more powerful alternative to the Steam Deck.

articles.title: BIOSTAR INTRODUCES THE EDGECOMP MS-N97 INDUSTRIAL SYSTEM
articles.summary: BIOSTAR introduces the EdgeComp MS-N97, a new industrial system designed for smart retail. The EdgeComp MS-N97 features a compact, fanless design and is powered by the Intel® Alder Lake-N N97 processor. It supports M.2-based AI accelerators and is compatible with various operating systems, making it suitable for applications like kiosks, vending machines, and digital signage.

articles.title: The bizarre truth about how astronauts deal with dirty clothes on the International Space Station will blow your mind
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: NASA and Tide partnered to develop a fully degradable laundry detergent designed for space use. The goal is to enable astronauts to wash clothes in microgravity with minimal water, offering a more sustainable solution than incinerating used clothing.

articles.title: 33 Products That Are Surprising Life Hacks
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Various new products are available through Amazon, including microfiber mop slippers for cleaning, a T-shirt organizer for closet storage, silicone gap covers for kitchen counters, and automatic toilet bowl cleaning packs. Other products available on Amazon are: AirFly Pro wireless transmitter, wrinkle releaser fabric-freshening spray, Sheet detanglers, Coffee to iced coffee device, three-pronged duster, eyeliner stamp, Tubshroom, Dishwasher magnet, Hypoallergenic body wipes and Grout ink pen.

articles.title: ASUS Republic of Gamers Announces the ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X, Raising the Standard for Gaming Handhelds
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Xbox is launching a new handheld device with a redesigned chassis for all-day comfort, purpose-built to fit the hands like a gamepad. The new Xbox software offers a seamless gaming experience for both Xbox and Windows PC games. The device features two new processors for AAA and indie gaming experiences with efficiency and performance.

articles.title: Macho new Hyundai Santa Fe seven-seater launches in SA
articles.author: Business Day
articles.summary: Hyundai launched its new fifth-generation seven-seat Santa Fe model in South Africa. The initial offering is the Santa Fe Hybrid Elite AWD model, marking the first hybrid Santa Fe in the country.

articles.title: MASSIVE: Ole Miss, Lane Kiffin in PRIME position to land MOST IMPORTANT RECRUIT
articles.summary: WeAreIowa launched the WeAreIowa app. The app is needed to stream WeAreIowa on your phone.

articles.title: Silksong Release Date: Hollow Knight Sequel at Summer Game Fest!
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: Microsoft, in collaboration with Asus, is launching the Xbox Ally handheld gaming device. Hollow Knight: Silksong will launch alongside the Xbox Ally and be available on Game Pass. The Xbox Ally aims to compete with Nintendo's Switch by offering a comparable experience to modern consoles for games like Silksong.

articles.title: 29 Products That Are The Only Ones You Need To See
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: Nivea introduces a lightweight gel cream enhanced with Q10 for improved skin hydration and firmness. Sol de Janeiro launches a shimmering body oil with SPF 50, known for its pleasant scent. Veet offers a sensitive hair removal gel for effective hair removal without irritation. E.l.f Cosmetics unveils Lash XTNDR tubing mascara that removes easily with water. Mise En Scene presents a nutrient-rich hair serum for hydration, strength, and shine. Miss Mouth's Messy Eater Stain Treater effectively removes stains without harsh chemicals.

articles.title: Walton Goggins Clogs: Walmart's Newest Find?
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Walmart is rolling out a new advertising campaign, 'Walmart. Who Knew?', to showcase its diverse product range and attract new customers. The company is also expanding its product offerings through a third-party marketplace and investing in technology like augmented reality to enhance the shopping experience. Walmart+ provides enhanced services such as one-hour delivery options.

articles.title: The Xbox Ally X Is Real: Here's What You Need to Know
articles.author: Jacqueline Thomas
articles.summary: Microsoft has announced the Xbox Ally and Xbox Ally X, handheld gaming PCs, with the latter powered by a new AMD AI Z2 Extreme processor. The Xbox Ally X will feature a 1080p display with a 120Hz refresh rate and VRR support, and boot directly into a handheld-focused version of the Xbox App, expected to launch during the holiday season.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2: Power, Refinement & Future of Gaming
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Nintendo Switch 2, a hybrid console, featuring an improved OLED screen and enhanced portability. Priced at $349.99 USD, it utilizes a custom Nvidia Tegra processor for enhanced visuals. The console is backwards compatible and Nintendo is expected to enhance its Nintendo Switch Online service.

articles.title: Father's Day Style
articles.author: CEDTy Clea
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer promotes its menswear collection for Father's Day. Montblanc introduces new writing instruments, luggage, headphones, and watches, including the Montblanc 1858 Geosphere 0 Oxygen The 8000 Watch. Anko offers affordable outdoor gear and tech gadgets, such as coolers, tents, earphones, and speakers. Rustan's features fragrances, clothing, grooming tools, and skincare products like the Nuxe Huile Prodigieuse Neroli for Father's Day.

articles.title: 33 Of The Best Summer Products You've Seen In A While
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: Ninja launched the Slushi maker, allowing users to create slushees from any drink. The product features presets, a rinse cycle, dishwasher-safe parts, and an 88-oz capacity. It is available on Amazon for $349.99.

articles.title: The Verge's favorite summer gear for 2025
articles.author: Verge Staff
articles.summary: The Ninja Swirl Creami is a new ice-cream maker and soft-serve dispenser, which can also turn store-bought ice cream into soft-serve. The Ultimate Ears Wonderboom 4 is a portable, waterproof Bluetooth speaker. Thermacell E55 is a rechargeable mosquito repeller that creates a safe zone to avoid mosquito bites.

articles.title: 37 Beauty Products Under $25 That'll Cast Serious Spells
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: LilyAna Naturals introduces a retinol cream supporting natural collagen production.  TirTir has a satin-finish cushion foundation for 72-hour flawless coverage. Revlon offers an oil-absorbing volcanic face roller for eliminating excess oil.

articles.title: Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 Flagship: Underrated & Recommended
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: A mobile phone featuring a Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, a 120 Hz display, and 512 GB of storage offers a compelling alternative to mainstream brands like iPhone and Samsung. This high-performance device aims to deliver a premium user experience at a competitive price point. Emerging brands like Nubia are challenging the mobile phone market by offering high-quality devices at more accessible prices.

articles.title: Oil and Gas Sector Manager Shares Leadership and Career Tips
articles.author: Vinícius Alonso
articles.summary: Field Fusion Solutions, founded by Muhammad Naveed Afzal, specializes in project management within the oil, gas, and petrochemical sectors. The company integrates AI, digital twins, and sustainable practices to enhance operational efficiency and promote innovation. They also focus on equipping their team with skills in AI and data analytics.

articles.title: Myntra Goes Global: Targeting Indian Diaspora with Singapore Launch
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Myntra has launched its e-commerce platform in Singapore, targeting the Indian diaspora. The launch, which occurred on May 19, aims to serve the underpenetrated Indian e-fashion market in Singapore and cater to the preferences of Gen Z customers.

articles.title: Beauty fans are ‘obsessed' with viral £2 Boots buy that ‘stops sweating', lasts ‘all day' & is ‘exactly' like £234 scent
articles.author: Abigail Wilson
articles.summary: Gem Skin-Loving has launched a new Santal Antiperspirant Deodorant, available at Boots, which is said to provide 48 hours of sweat protection and smells similar to Le Labo Santal 33 Eau de Parfum. The deodorant is enriched with ingredients like Hyaluronic Acid, Shea Butter, and Vitamin E, and comes in four scents: Cool Fresh, Vanilla Coconut, Vanilla Macadamia, and Santal.

articles.title: Worthing town centre has a brand new supermarket
articles.author: Chief Reporter
org: Worthing Town Centre Business Improvement District
articles.summary: AsiaMart, an Asian food supermarket, has opened on Montague Street in Worthing, offering 10% off. Aydo International Supermarket also opened recently in Portland Road, selling various fresh products and items from multiple countries.

articles.title: Speculation Swirls Around Mystery Tesla Model
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Tesla will begin production of a new model this month. The new Tesla model is possibly a stripped down Model Y or Model 3 or both.

articles.title: Aldi launches £2.49 buy that will banish flies, wasps and mosquitoes from your home this summer – it works ‘instantly'
articles.author: Abigail Wilson
articles.summary: Aldi has launched a new product called 'Fly & Wasp Spray', priced at £2.49, which is designed to instantly kill flies, wasps, and mosquitoes. The spray is intended for indoor use and described as a fast-acting killer, providing an affordable solution to pest control.

articles.title: Aldi launches £2.49 buy that will banish flies, wasps and mosquitoes from your home this summer – it works ‘instantly'
articles.author: Abigail Wilson
articles.summary: Aldi has launched a new product called 'Zero In Fly & Wasp Spray' priced at £2.49. The spray is described as a 'fast-acting killer' effective against flies, wasps, and mosquitoes, intended for indoor use and available in Aldi stores nationwide while stocks last.

articles.title: Best Samsung washing machines: AI tech innovations for your home
articles.author: Stuart Pritchard
articles.summary: Samsung introduces the Bespoke AI Series 9 washing machine, featuring a 'Dark Steel' design, LCD touchscreen, and AI Home for personalized wash cycles. The appliance boasts AI Wash, AI Ecobubble, Auto Dose, and Bixby voice control, alongside energy efficiency and various wash programs.

articles.title: Dunelm knocks £15 off 'brilliant' Brabantia compact washing line that can hold 'three loads of laundry'
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Dunelm is offering a discounted Brabantia 4 Arm Compact Rotary Washing Line with 40 metres of drying space. The washing line features an umbrella opening system and comes with a weather-resistant cover. It can hold more than three loads of washing and has loops to prevent clothes from creasing.

articles.title: This Viral Beauty Brand Is Replacing Reviewers' Favorite High-End Products
articles.author: Michelle Rostamian
articles.summary: MCoBeauty recently launched several new skincare and makeup products. The products include pore-minimizing toner, skin-smoothing pressed powder, antioxidant-rich bronzing drops, luxury-inspired hair and body mist, makeup-extending setting spray, brow lamination, color-correcting serum and peptide-infused lip treatment, offering various benefits such as exfoliation, hydration, and color correction. The products are available at Target.

articles.title: OnePlus 13s review: A compact flagship for small hands and tight pockets
articles.author: Tushar Kanwar
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the OnePlus 13s, a new compact flagship smartphone. The OnePlus 13s features a Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, a 6.32-inch AMOLED display, and a 5,850 mAh battery with 80W charging. It also includes a dual camera system with 50MP rear and 50MP 2x telephoto lenses.

articles.title: New Look £30 dress 'looks more expensive than it is' and gives 'cowgirl vibes'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: New Look is selling the Tan Faux Suede Belted Mini Dress for £29.99. The dress, cut in a classic shift silhouette with a faux suede finish, features a detachable belt buckle, mini length, round neckline, and rear keyhole button. To complete the look, customers can also purchase the Tan Faux Suede Collarless Jacket, Wide Fit Tan Brown Raffia Platform Sole Sandals and Chestnut Faux Suede Large Tote Bag.

articles.title: Shoppers 'come back to' face wash with loads of five-star reviews
articles.author: Tiffany Lo
articles.summary: Fresh Soy Face Cleanser, first introduced in 1990, combines soy proteins, cucumber extract, and rosewater for a hydrating and softening effect. It serves as both a makeup remover and deep cleanser, with soy protein aiding skin elasticity and pH balance. The cleanser is available in various sizes at different retailers, and customer reviews highlight its gentleness, effectiveness in removing makeup, and suitability for sensitive skin.

articles.title: Shock Sky sale slashes Google Pixel to lowest price yet
articles.author: Chris Hall
articles.summary: Sky Mobile is offering discounts on Google's Pixel phones, including the Pixel 9a and Pixel 9 Pro XL. The Pixel 9a, Google's affordable model in the Pixel 9 family launched in April 2025, starts at £14 a month. The Pixel 9 Pro XL starts from £28 a month.

articles.title: Google pixel 9 pro XL
articles.author: James Carter
articles.summary: Google has unveiled the Google Pixel 9 Pro, a new flagship smartphone. It features a 42MP front camera, 5x optical zoom, and a triple-lens rear camera setup (50MP, 48MP, and 48MP sensors).

articles.title: I recommend the Pixel 9 to most people looking to upgrade - especially while it's $250 off
articles.author: Max Buondonno
articles.summary: Google launched its latest flagship phone, the Pixel 9, starting at $799. The Pixel 9 features a new Tensor G4 processor, an updated design with flat sides and rounded corners, slightly upgraded performance and cameras, a slightly bigger battery, and new AI features. It is positioned as an Android alternative to the iPhone 16.

articles.title: Verizon is offering a free iPhone 16 Pro Max - here's how you can get one
articles.author: Allison Jewell
articles.summary: Verizon is offering a 'free' iPhone 16 Pro Max when customers open a new line under the Unlimited Ultimate plan and commit to a 36-month contract. The Unlimited Ultimate plan starts at $65 a line per month, and customers are responsible for taxes and fees. Boost Mobile is also offering a deal on the iPhone 16 with no trade-in required.

articles.title: Adrian Weckler: Honest debate about drones must go a lot further than whinging about noise
articles.author: Adrian Weckler
articles.summary: Manna, a drone delivery firm, has signed a deal with Deliveroo to provide drone delivery services. Manna expects to have up to 10,000 daily drone delivery flights across 10 locations in Ireland by the end of the year.

articles.title: Lidl launches its new summer 2025 fashion range – prices start from just £5 and ...
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: Lidl released its first clothing range in July 2024. Due to its success, Lidl has released more clothing for summer 2025.

articles.title: MEXC Launchpad Debuts With Discounted Bitcoin Subscriptions
articles.author: Bitcoin
articles.summary: MEXC launched a new 'Launchpad' platform. The platform is designed to provide fair and transparent access to high-quality tokens.

articles.title: Shock Sky sale slashes Google Pixel to lowest price yet
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Sky Mobile is offering a deal on Google's latest phone. The offer promotes the availability of Google's newest phone through Sky Mobile.

articles.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong comes out of hiding, with a 2025 release date promise
articles.author: Polygon
articles.summary: Microsoft announced that Hollow Knight: Silksong will be released later this year. This announcement occurred during the Xbox Games Showcase where Microsoft's Sarah Bond revealed the release window.

articles.title: Watch out Nintendo Switch 2 – Microsoft just revealed the ROG Xbox Ally and Xbox ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: ASUS' ROG brand is introducing the ROG Ally, a handheld PC designed for portable gaming. The ROG Ally is positioned as a potential alternative to a portable Xbox experience.

articles.title: Aldi in Medford to hold grand opening June 12
articles.author: Heidi Sutton
articles.summary: Aldi is opening a new supermarket in Medford on June 12, with a grand opening event including prizes and discounts. This Medford location is part of Aldi's plan to open over 225 new stores in 2025 as part of their five-year growth strategy.
